summary: This bill, H.R. 5242, introduced by Mr. Kustoff, seeks to repeal two prior acts: the Second Chance Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24–284) and the Incarceration Reduction Amendment Act of 2016 (title III of the Comprehensive Youth Justice Amendment Act of 2016; D.C. Law 21–36). The bill mandates that any laws amended or repealed by the aforementioned acts are restored or revived to their previous state as if the original acts had never been passed.
